name: Swift LSP
description: Swift language server (SourceKit-LSP) for Claude Code, providing code intelligence for Swift projects.
longDescription: Integrates `sourcekit-lsp` (SourceKit-LSP) as a language server for Swift files (`.swift`). Provides code intelligence, completions, go-to-definition, and diagnostics. Included with the Swift toolchain â€” install Xcode or `brew install swift` (macOS), or Swift from swift.org (Linux). No separate installation required if Swift is already available.
